metadata.name: Krystexxa 8 mg ml Injection solution concentrate

clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Limaprost is used for the improvement of various ischemic symptoms such as ulcer pain and feeling of coldness associated with thromboangiitis obliterans as well as improvement of subjective symptoms pain and numbness of lower legs and gait ability associated with acquired lumbar spinal canal stenosis in patients with bilateral intermittent claudication showing normal SLR test result

contraindications.disease: The most common adverse effects seen with limaprost are diarrhea nausea vomiting flushing abdominal discomfort and headache FDA Label
contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Limaprost produces vasodilation to improve blood flow to the extremities and increase cutaneous temperature FDA Label

incompatibilities.description: The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Limaprost is combined with Lepirudin
